txt.en: This food-trough looks empty. There seems to be a decent supply of grain in the area. Search the containers for grain to put in the food-trough.
The Stable-helper wants you to help the newly-arrived horse to settle into his new stall at the Combe stables.
The grain was mouldy and unfit for horses.
You put the collected grain in the trough!
The food for the food-trough can be found around the stable area.
Return the grain to the trough
The grain can be placed in the food-trough inside the new horse's stall.
